medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient first noticed abdominal/chest pain on the night after dinner, lasting for 5 days. The pain was intermittent, worsening in the evening and improving during the day. The patient experienced severe pain that prompted her to seek medical attention. Currently, the RUQ pain has almost completely resolved.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Colonic polyps, Essential tremor, Hyperlipidemia, Melanoma, Appendectomy, Left salpingo-oophorectomy, Supracervical hysterectomy
